categories.name: Tool Capabilities
categories.description: Explore Integration Bus concepts by following simple tutorials

tutorials.name: Using a LoopBack Request node to insert data into a Cloudant database
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the LoopBackRequest node to create a JSON document in a Cloudant database (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 6 or later).

tutorials.name: Calling an IBM Integration Bus Callable Flow from App Connect Enterprise
tutorials.shortDesc: Calling an IBM Integration Bus Callable Flow from App Connect Enterprise

tutorials.name: Using a WorkLoad Management Policy to restrict the maximum throughput of a flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Workload Management Policy to restrict the maximum rate at which a message flow can run.

tutorials.name: Using a Sequence node to inject a sequence number into a message
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Sequence node to inject sequence numbers into message data as it goes through a message flow.

tutorials.name: Using a Resequence node to reorder messages going through a flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Resequence node to control the sequence in which a group of incoming messages are propagated through the message flow.

tutorials.name: Producing and consuming Kafka messages
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the KafkaProducer and KafkaConsumer nodes in a message flow (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 7 or later).

tutorials.name: Call a REST API using the RESTRequest node
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a RESTRequest node to call a REST API (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 6 or later).

tutorials.name: Call a REST API using the RESTAsyncRequest node
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a RESTAsyncRequest node to call a REST API and a RESTAsyncResponse node to receive the response (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 6 or later).

tutorials.name: Using Bluemix Product Insights to view IBM Integration Bus Startup and Usage
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Product Insights service on Bluemix to get a centralized view of IBM Integration Bus Startup and Usage (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 8 or later).

tutorials.name: Using Bluemix Kibana Dashboards to view IIB Logs
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Kibana Dashboard on Bluemix to get a centralised view of IIB Logs (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 8 or later).

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using MQ nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using MQ nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using HTTPAsyncRequest nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous HTTP nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using RESTAsyncRequest nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous REST nodes (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 6 or later).

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using SOAPAsyncRequest nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous SOAP nodes.

tutorials.name: Aggregation nodes using CallableFlowAsyncInvoke nodes with back-end services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the Aggregation nodes to fan-out and fan-in messages using asynchronous Callable Flow nodes (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 8 or later).

tutorials.name: Integration services (SOAP/HTTP inputs)
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn about integration services that use SOAP/HTTP inputs in IBM Integration Bus by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Manage a set of records with IBM Integration Bus REST API services
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use an IBM Integration Bus REST API service to manage a set of records.

tutorials.name: Transformation using a Map in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Mapping node to transform data using a Map in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Transformation using ESQL in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Compute node to transform data using ESQL in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Transformation using Java in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a JavaCompute node to transform data using Java in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Transformation using Java (JAXB) in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a JavaCompute node to transform data using Java (JAXB) in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Transformation using XSL in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use an XSL Transform node to transform data using XSL in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Transformation using .NET in a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a .NETCompute node to transform data using C# in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Retrieving records from a Salesforce system
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the SalesforceRequest node to retrieve records from Salesforce.com (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 4 or later).

tutorials.name: Callable Flows
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to split flow processing using CallableFlow nodes (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 4 or later).

tutorials.name: Business transaction monitoring
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to monitor business transactions across flows (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 3 or later).

tutorials.name: Using a Mapping node to access a Lookup table that is stored in the Global Cache
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use a Mapping node to graphically access a Lookup table stored in the Global Cache (requires IBM Integration Bus v10 fixpack 2 or later).

tutorials.name: Receiving MQTT messages by subscribing to MQTT topics
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use the MQTTSubscribe node to receive messages from an MQTT server.

tutorials.name: HTTP Input to drive a message flow
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use an HTTP Input node to parse JSON data in an IBM Integration Bus message flow by exploring this simple example.

tutorials.name: Integration using TCPIP nodes
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to use TCP/IP nodes for integration with external applications using TCPIP sockets.

tutorials.name: Large message splitting
tutorials.shortDesc: Split a large input message into individual records, using Java transformation code, in a memory-efficient manner.

tutorials.name: Modeling CSV data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model CSV data using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling COBOL data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model COBOL data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling EDIFACT data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model EDIFACT data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling HL7 data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model HL7 healthcare data using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling Toshiba 4690 TLog data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model Toshiba 4690 Point of Sale Transaction Log data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

tutorials.name: Modeling ISO 8583 data by using DFDL
tutorials.shortDesc: Learn how to model ISO 8583 data by using Data Format Description Language (DFDL).

categories.name: Scenarios
categories.description: Explore powerful Integration Bus capabilities through integrated scenarios
